name: Quill's Run
description:
Help Quill Escape

Quill spreads ink by walking on platforms
Quarrel can confront angels while standing in ink

Difficulty levels:

  • Hard: Platform must be fully inked to confront Angels
  • Medium: Platform needs only three layers of ink to confront Angels
  • Easy: Ink does not get cleaned between attempts

Press up at any time to change the difficulty level

(thanks to Axi for letting me steal inspiration from their game jam game!)
